h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Gore-Eye Daoist
content: He’ll have a few more variations of expelling blood from his staff - either in a concentrated stream straight ahead, or flinging his staff to create a wave of it in front of you, so be ready for waves of blood to fly out whenever he charges up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windseal Gate' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Gore-Eye Daoist'.
The content is as follows:
He’ll have a few more variations of expelling blood from his staff - either in a concentrated stream straight ahead, or flinging his staff to create a wave of it in front of you, so be ready for waves of blood to fly out whenever he charges up.
